title: Microsoft releases Windows 11 build 22000.651 to the Release Preview channel
content:
Today, Microsoft is releasing this month’s preview updates to Windows Insiders. Those in the Release Preview channel will get Windows 11 build 22000.651 or Windows 10 build 19044.1679, depending on what your machine supports. By preview update, that means that production users will have the opportunity to opt into testing this in a week or

The post Microsoft releases Windows 11 build 22000.651 to the Release Preview channel appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has released this month's Windows 10 and Windows 11 preview updates to Windows Insiders on the Release Preview channel.
